mapper.insert: insert into board (title, writer, content, has_file) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{hasFile})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, mod_at, read_count from board
select count(bno) from board where bno > 0
mapper.update: update board set has_file = #{cnt} where bno = #{bno}
update board set read_count = read_count + #{cnt} where bno = #{bno}
update board set cmt_qty = cmt_qty + #{cnt} where bno = #{bno}
